Open Peer review can refer to various practises, including signing your review, publishing reviews along with the paper, and allowing for the community to contribute to the peer review process.

## More information

-   **The Turing Way** has a chapter on [Peer Review](https://the-turing-way.netlify.app/communication/peer-review.html), including a section on [Open Peer Review](https://the-turing-way.netlify.app/communication/peer-review/peer-review-open.html).

-   Check the [**Open Reviewers Review Guide**](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5484087). Pages 28-31 provide insights about what a reviewer would look for when evaluating your manuscript.

-   Read some [reflections on **reviewing in the publishing system**](http://neural-reckoning.org/reviewing.html).
